description: The Ramos Gin Fizz cocktail is made with gin, lemon juice, lime juice, orange flower water, and egg white. The drink is usually shaken or stirred before being strained into a tall glass filled with ice cubes.
name: Ramos Gin Fizz

recipeInstructions.name: Shake the gin, egg white, lemon and lime juice, heavy cream, simple syrup, and orange blossom in a cocktail shaker with no ice.
recipeInstructions.text: Shake the gin, egg white, lemon and lime juice, heavy cream, simple syrup, and orange blossom in a cocktail shaker with no ice.

recipeInstructions.name: Add ice and shake until cold.
recipeInstructions.text: Add ice and shake until cold.

recipeInstructions.name: Strain into a Collins glass and top with a splash of club soda.
